data.title: Viewing For the Good of the Clan Book
data.meta_description: He never intended to go back home after that day...Oliver never thought he’d be happy after he left his pack when he refused to fight his brother. Now, nine years later, the sanctuary he found working in the corporate world might come to an end. Namely, due to the mountain of calls from his old pack coming into his office phone.The alpha’s actions have turned violent and, as his brother, the pack is begging him to help. Oliver’s plan to tune out the pack is ruined by a call from his childhood best friend, Rachel. He can’t ignore the pleas for help from his old clan after Rachel shows up in his office. Or that she's his mate.Oliver’s two worlds clash as he walks back into a battle he never wanted to fight. Only now there is much more on the line.For the Good of the Clan is a standalone second chance, unrequited love novella. It is part of the Corporate Shifters series but the books can be read in any order.18+ This novel contains sex and profanity
